channel.title: Rust - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Today I Learnt...

item.title: About the `typos` source code spell checker
item.description: typos is a source code spell checker written Rust that’s useful for finding typos in code comments and variable names.

item.title: `dprint` can be used to speed up Prettier
item.description: dprint is a formatting platform written in Rust. It supports a Prettier plugin that can give a big performance increase via its incremental formatting functionality.
